newsitem.title: UKRAINE: FORECAST-Ukraine January inflation seen 3-4 pct.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST-Ukraine January inflation seen 3-4 pct.

text.p: Ukraine's monthly inflation rate is forecast to rise to between three and four percentin January from 0.9 percent last month, Deputy Prime Minister Viktor Pynzenyk said on Tuesday.
"I think the January inflation rate will be from three to four percent, even though other experts had previously stated a lower figure," he told a news conference.
Last week Pynzenyk forecast a 2.5 percent inflation rate for January.
Ukraine has forecast annual inflation at 25 percent this year, from 39.7 percent in 1996 and 181.7 percent in 1995.
